column3: Addressed @promag's nits, and added a few more code cleanups.

Nit, drop "used only once" `redeem_dest`:
```cpp
CScript redeemDestination = GetScriptForDestination(redeem_id);
```
commit: Do not expose SigVersion argument to IsMine\n\nnit: Drop the `::`. It's weird to have it on this call but not the other two.

commit: Switch to a private version of SigVersion inside IsMine\n\nPlease let a comment explaining what this is and how it differs from SigVersion. Even though it's in the commit comment, it's good to have it in the code.
commit: Track difference between scriptPubKey and P2SH execution in IsMine\n\nI think a function `bool SigVersionPermitsUncompressed(IsMineSigVersion)` would improve clarity.
Done (in the next commit, which actually introduces the difference).
Yes, that's much more readable. Done.
